Title: Land O' Smiles
Writer: Philip K. Dick (based on the book by), Frank Spotnitz (developed by), Rob Williams, Joe Kawasaki (staff writer)
Actors: Alexa Davalos, Rupert Evans, Luke Kleintank, DJ Qualls
Plot: As Juliana worms closer to the Smiths, she discovers a dangerous secret. Childan and Ed get themselves in a sticky situation as they try to settle the Yakuza debt. On a Resistance mission, ...
